Entries.default: "No, that's not right. When we kill dragons, they're supposed to stay dead. Pretty sure there's a law about it."
"I should have known that flying corpse would not stay down for long."
"A pity. I wanted to take its tooth as a keepsake."
"Down, Ishi. I don't want you following that dirty bird."
"Well then. Weren't exactly expecting that, were we?"
"Most intriguing. The dragon may be a vessel."
"Only a vessel could do that. Arkemyr would not dabble with the undead if he could avoid it."
"Maybe you did not whack it hard enough, Ed√©r."
"No, that's not right. When we kill dragons, they're supposed to stay dead. Pretty sure there's a law about it."
